text: Hatri is a Union Council of Hyderabad Taluka (rural) in the Sindh province of Pakistan. It has a population of 29,719, and is located at 25°28'0N 68°24'0E lying to the north-east of the district capital - Hyderabad.Location of Hatri - Falling Rain Genomics Hatri has 6,634 housing units. Among them 3813 are pacca, 575 semi pacca, and 2246 kacha housing units. According Pakistan Bureau of Statistics ==References== Category:Union councils of Hyderabad District
title: Hatri
